children.examples: IDEO Human-Centered Design, Stanford d.school Projects, Apple Product Design

children.terminology: 1. Empathize → Understand user needs and context through observation and engagement
2. Define → Frame the core problem based on user insights
3. Ideate → Generate a broad range of creative solutions
4. Prototype → Build scaled-down versions or models of solutions
5. Test → Evaluate prototypes to gather feedback and refine
